General.Name: LGB Forge Limited
General.Description: LGB Forge Limited engages in manufacture and sale of forged and machined components in India and internationally. The company offers auto, electrical, and transmission forged components to automobiles and non-automotive segments. It also provides hot, hot and warm, and cold forging products. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Coimbatore, India.

7.Name: R.  Shanmugam
7.Title: Plant Head of Hot Forging Coimbatore

8.Title: Chief Operating Officer - Hot Forging Division
